title: ‘Sonia Disowns Rahul’ Virus Hoax
subtitle: Warnings that cell phone users should not accept the video "Sonia Disowns Rahul" because it contains a malicious virus are a hoax.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: Cell phone users should not accept a video entitled "Sonia Disowns Rahul" because it contains a malicious virus.
